unknown: ^Character: I remember having a life before this.
^Character: Yesterday... I wonder what Alice meant...
^Demon: She was messing with you, there's always something wrong.
^Angel: Just be sure to do what's right, right now.
^Character: You only talk with each other and me..
^Character: and why can't you agree on anything!
sad: ^Demon: You don't have to. Just forget about it and move on.
^Angel: I am only here to advise you and your conscience.
^Character: These two aren't a real angel and devil.
^Angel: Just remember you won't be with us forever, make your own choices -- the right ones!
^Demon: Do what you can while you have the chance!
^Character: Good and bad. Soon and forever.
think: ^Character: Why do you two always conflict!!!
ending: ^Character: I can't see them...I think they're off to the right...
